pageContext.claim: “I don't know her [Olivia Troye]. She worked for the Vice President. She was on the task force as some kind of a lower-level person. I have no idea who she is. I don't met her -- I never met her, to the best of my knowledge. Maybe she was in a room. I have no idea who she is. She doesn't know me.”
pageContext.analysis: Troye is a long-time Republican operative was Pence's chief staff member on the coronavirus task force, not a low level person. Trump made these remarks after Troye emerged as a public critic of the administration's handling of the pandemic, calling ou what she described as Trump’s “flat out disregard for human life."
